ComicInfo.Penciller: Jack Jadson,Nei Ruffino,Phil Noto,Jack Jadson,Phil Noto,Nei Ruffino
ComicInfo.Summary:
Glasfindel is warned to leave the forest alone by Sonja.
Red Sonja frees the God of the Green from a witch and makes love to him. He creates a child in her image.
Red Sonja shares a drink wth the bartender.
Red Sonja rescues Jenny from a band of thieves.
Kahar and his band continue their pursuit of Sonja and are introduced to Jenny, the mller's daughter.
ComicInfo.Title: She Lives Still; Jenny's Story: Parallax
ComicInfo.Writer: Gail Simone,Marjorie Liu,Mercedes Lackey,Gail Simone,Marjorie M. Liu,Mercedes Lackey
